name: Stage of Humanity
description:
В этой игре использовался собственный арт, музыка и код. Спасибо за то, что посмотрите на наше детище!

You are the leader of the tribe. Your task is to help your people move to the next stage of civilization. 
And remember, humanity is governed by the actions and decisions of their leaders.

Control is performed using the WASD key. In order to complete the level You need to get to the blue lighthouse. Along the way, you can collect orange beacons for special events. In these events, you will have to make a choice that will have consequences. Good luck!
